txt.en: Reeve Fríthild fell ill and died during the feast celebrating her foray ay Bardh-dorám.
Thane Ordlac is in the Mead Hall of Stoke.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Ordlac regarding the funeral.
'I believe your presence will assuage the children's hurt a little. Thank you.'

'Do you think it was too soon for me to declare my regency? The children seemed distressed. Surely, they must understand that someone must lead their people until such time as Fríthbert comes of age?'
Thane Ordlac is in the Mead Hall of Stoke.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Ordlac when you are prepared to attend Fríthild's funeral.
Ordlac has proclaimed himself regent of the Broadacres
Talk to Thane Ordlac to attend Reeve Fríthild's funeral

'[placeholder], my friend, a shadow of gloom has fallen over the people of Stoke, especially Fríthild's children. We must rebuild their hope.\n\n'Will you join me at Fríthild's house to honour her passing? It would mean much to the children, I am sure.'
